supabase.name: supabase
supabase.description: Supabase database, storage, auth, edge functions, and management via REST APIs

tools.name: query-table
tools.description: Query a table using Supabase REST API. Supports select, filter, order, limit.

tools.name: insert-row
tools.description: Insert a row into a table using Supabase REST API

tools.name: update-rows
tools.description: Update rows in a table using Supabase REST API. Filter is required.

tools.name: delete-rows
tools.description: Delete rows from a table using Supabase REST API. Filter is required.

tools.name: list-buckets
tools.description: List all storage buckets

tools.name: create-bucket
tools.description: Create a new storage bucket

tools.name: delete-bucket
tools.description: Delete a storage bucket (must be empty)

tools.name: get-bucket
tools.description: Get details of a specific bucket

tools.name: list-files
tools.description: List files in a storage bucket or folder

tools.name: delete-file
tools.description: Delete one or more files from a bucket

tools.name: get-public-url
tools.description: Get the public URL for a file (bucket must be public)

examples.description: Get public URL for an image

tools.name: create-signed-url
tools.description: Create a signed URL for temporary access to a private file

tools.name: move-file
tools.description: Move or rename a file within a bucket

tools.name: upload-file
tools.description: Upload a file to a storage bucket (from local file path or base64 content)

examples.description: Upload from local file path (auto-detects content type)

tools.name: download-file
tools.description: Download a file from a storage bucket (returns base64-encoded content)

tools.name: invoke-function
tools.description: Invoke an Edge Function with optional payload (uses anon key by default, or service role key)

examples.description: Invoke admin function with service role

tools.name: list-functions
tools.description: List all deployed Edge Functions using the Management API (requires SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN)

tools.name: create-user
tools.description: Create a new user with email and password (uses service role key)

tools.name: list-users
tools.description: List all users with pagination (uses service role key)

examples.description: List page 2 with 100 users per page

tools.name: get-user
tools.description: Get a user by UUID (uses service role key)

tools.name: update-user
tools.description: Update a user (email, password, metadata, ban status) using service role key

tools.name: delete-user
tools.description: Delete a user permanently (uses service role key)

tools.name: run-sql
tools.description: Execute SQL query via Management API. Requires SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN.

input.query: CREATE TABLE test (id serial PRIMARY KEY, name text)

tools.name: generate-types-api
tools.description: Generate TypeScript types from database schema via Management API. Requires SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN. Works without Docker or local Supabase.

examples.expectedOutput: { types: "export type Json = ... export interface Database { ... }" }

tools.name: list-tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in one or more schemas with columns, constraints, and RLS status

tools.name: execute-sql
tools.description: Executes raw SQL in the Postgres database. Use apply-migration for DDL operations.

input.query: SELECT count(*) FROM transactions WHERE status = 'active'

tools.name: apply-migration
tools.cliCommand: supabase migration new <name> && supabase db push
tools.description: Applies a migration to the database. Use for DDL operations (CREATE, ALTER, etc.)

input.name: create_users_table
input.query: CREATE TABLE users (id uuid PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(), email text UNIQUE NOT NULL)

examples.description: Add a column to existing table

input.name: add_avatar_to_profiles
input.query: ALTER TABLE profiles ADD COLUMN avatar_url text

tools.name: get-logs
tools.description: Gets logs for a Supabase project by service type. Returns logs within the last 24 hours.

tools.name: get-advisors
tools.description: Gets advisory notices for security vulnerabilities or performance improvements. Run after DDL changes.

examples.description: Get security advisors (check for missing RLS)

tools.name: generate-types
tools.description: Generates TypeScript types for the project database schema for type-safe queries

shadcn.name: shadcn
shadcn.description: shadcn/ui component registry - search, view, and install UI components

tools.name: search-items
tools.description: Search for components in the shadcn/ui registry using fuzzy matching. Use view-items to see component code.

tools.name: view-items
tools.description: View component details including source code from the shadcn/ui registry.

tools.name: get-examples
tools.description: Find usage examples and demos with complete code from the shadcn/ui registry.

tools.name: get-add-command
tools.description: Get the shadcn CLI add command for specific items. Use for installing components.

examples.expectedOutput: { command: "npx shadcn@latest add button card dialog", items: ["button", "card", "dialog"] }

boldsign.name: boldsign
boldsign.description: BoldSign e-signature API for documents, templates, webhooks, and audit trails

tools.name: list-documents
tools.description: List and search BoldSign documents with pagination, filtering by status, and date ranges.

tools.name: get-document-status
tools.description: Get detailed status of a BoldSign document including signer progress, audit events, and download links.

tools.name: send-reminder
tools.description: Send reminder emails to pending signers on a BoldSign document.

tools.name: extend-expiry
tools.description: Extend the expiration date of a BoldSign document.

tools.name: get-audit-trail
tools.description: Get the audit trail for a BoldSign document with all signing events and timestamps.

tools.name: revoke-document
tools.description: Revoke/cancel a BoldSign document that is still pending signatures.

tools.name: download-document
tools.description: Download signed, original, combined, or audit trail PDF from a BoldSign document. Returns base64 encoded content.

tools.name: get-embedded-sign-link
tools.description: Generate an embedded signing link for in-app document signing. The link can be used in an iframe or opened in a new window.

examples.description: Generate embedded signing link with 30-minute expiry
Generate link with custom redirect URL

tools.name: prefill-fields
tools.description: Pre-fill form field values in a BoldSign document. Document must be in draft state. Useful for populating buyer/seller names, addresses, and transaction details.

examples.description: Prefill buyer and seller names in purchase agreement

tools.name: change-recipient
tools.description: Replace a signer/recipient on an existing BoldSign document.

examples.expectedOutput: { success: true, previousSigner: { email: "old-buyer@example.com" }, newSigner: { email: "new-buyer@example.com" } }

tools.name: void-and-resend
tools.description: Void an existing document and send a corrected version from the same template. Composite operation that revokes the original and creates a new document with corrections.

examples.description: Void and resend with corrected signer
Void and resend with corrected field values

tools.name: list-templates
tools.description: List available BoldSign document templates with search and pagination.

tools.name: get-template
tools.description: Get detailed information about a BoldSign template including roles and form fields.

tools.name: send-from-template
tools.description: Send a document for signature using a BoldSign template.

tools.name: merge-and-send
tools.description: Merge multiple BoldSign templates into a single document and send for signing. Useful for combining disclosure packages or multi-document workflows.

input.title: Purchase Agreement with Disclosures - 123 Main St

tools.name: bulk-send-reminder
tools.description: Send reminder emails to multiple documents at once. Supports single document mode, explicit document ID list, or automatic "all pending" mode with optional age filtering.

examples.description: Send reminder to single document (backward compatible)
Send reminders to all pending documents older than 3 days

tools.name: list-webhook-events
tools.description: List and filter BoldSign webhook events from the database for debugging and audit purposes.

examples.description: List recent events for a document

tools.name: webhook-health
tools.description: Check BoldSign webhook processing health including success rates, latency, recent errors, and configurable alert thresholds.

tools.name: test-webhook
tools.description: Send a test webhook payload to verify webhook handler is working correctly.

tools.name: get-config-status
tools.description: Check BoldSign and Supabase configuration status for debugging connectivity issues.

examples.expectedOutput: { boldsignConfigured: true, supabaseConfigured: true, hasOAuthCredentials: true }

tools.name: replay-webhook
tools.description: Re-process failed webhook events by resending them to the webhook handler.

examples.description: Replay all failed events for a document

tools.name: get-api-credits
tools.description: Check BoldSign API credit usage, quota, and remaining credits for monitoring.

tools.name: debug-document-timeline
tools.description: Visualize document signing timeline with event durations and identify signing bottlenecks.

tools.name: list-sender-identities
tools.description: List all BoldSign sender identities with their verification status.

stripe.name: stripe
stripe.description: Stripe payment API for customers, payments, subscriptions, invoices, webhooks, and financial data

tools.name: list-customers
tools.description: List and search Stripe customers with pagination and filtering by email or creation date.

tools.name: get-customer
tools.description: Get detailed customer information including payment methods and subscriptions.

tools.name: list-payments
tools.description: List PaymentIntents with filters for customer, status, and date range.

tools.name: get-payment
tools.description: Get detailed PaymentIntent information including charges and failure details.

tools.name: list-subscriptions
tools.description: List subscriptions with filters for customer, status, and price.

tools.name: get-subscription
tools.description: Get detailed subscription information including billing history and upcoming invoice.

tools.name: list-products
tools.description: List Stripe products (subscription plans, one-time purchases) with optional active filter.

tools.name: list-prices
tools.description: List Stripe prices (pricing plans) with filters for product, type (recurring/one-time), and currency.

examples.description: List prices for a specific product

tools.name: list-invoices
tools.description: List invoices with filters for customer, subscription, status, and date range.

tools.name: list-webhook-events
tools.description: Query Stripe events for webhook debugging with type and date filters.

tools.name: webhook-health
tools.description: Check webhook processing health and metrics over a time period.

tools.name: get-balance
tools.description: Get Stripe account balance including available and pending funds.

tools.name: list-disputes
tools.description: List payment disputes (chargebacks) with filters and summary statistics.

tools.name: create-test-customer
tools.description: Create a test customer in test mode with optional test payment method.

examples.description: Create test customer with payment method

tools.name: get-config-status
tools.description: Check Stripe API configuration status for debugging connectivity issues.

examples.expectedOutput: { stripeConfigured: true, isTestMode: true, hasSecretKey: true }
